name: Turnt Ninja
description:
Welcome to the in-development version of Turnt Ninja, a crazy rhythm game set to your music!

Turnt Ninja is open-source and hosted on Github!

Latest Release Notes

Supports MP3, FLAC, AAC, WAV and more (Linux currently only supports FLAC and WAV files).

Also supports streaming SoundCloud songs.

This game is still heavily in development so there may be bugs, please open a discussion thread or email me if it crashes.

Epilipsey Warning: This game contains occasional flashing colours, which may cause epilipsey in certain people.

Website | Twitter | Github
